# CSF3 Story Template Reference

This is the reference template for Component Story Format 3 (Storybook 7+/8+).

## Structure

```typescript
// @storyteller-managed
// Auto-generated by storyteller â€” edits to managed stories will be overwritten on sync.
// Add custom stories below the CUSTOM STORIES section and they'll be preserved.

import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { ComponentName } from './ComponentName';

const meta = {
  title: 'Category/ComponentName',
  component: ComponentName,
  tags: ['autodocs'],
  parameters: {
    layout: 'centered', // or 'fullscreen', 'padded'
  },
  argTypes: {
    variant: {
      control: 'select',
      options: ['primary', 'secondary', 'ghost'],
      description: 'Visual variant of the component',
    },
    size: {
      control: 'radio',
      options: ['sm', 'md', 'lg'],
    },
    disabled: {
      control: 'boolean',
    },
    onClick: {
      action: 'clicked',
    },
  },
  args: {
    // Default args shared by all stories
    variant: 'primary',
    size: 'md',
    disabled: false,
  },
} satisfies Meta<typeof ComponentName>;

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj<typeof meta>;

// -- PRIMARY STATES --

export const Default: Story = {};

export const Primary: Story = {
  args: {
    variant: 'primary',
    children: 'Primary Action',
  },
};

export const Secondary: Story = {
  args: {
    variant: 'secondary',
    children: 'Secondary Action',
  },
};

// -- EDGE CASES --

export const Disabled: Story = {
  args: {
    disabled: true,
    children: 'Disabled Button',
  },
};

export const LongLabel: Story = {
  args: {
    children: 'This is a button with an unusually long label to test overflow behavior',
  },
};

// -- INTERACTIVE --

export const WithPlayFunction: Story = {
  args: {
    children: 'Click Me',
  },
  play: async ({ canvasElement }) => {
    const canvas = within(canvasElement);
    const button = canvas.getByRole('button');
    await userEvent.click(button);
  },
};

// ---- CUSTOM STORIES (below this line will be preserved) ----
```

## Key Conventions

### Meta Object
- Use `satisfies Meta<typeof Component>` for type safety
- Set `tags: ['autodocs']` to enable automatic documentation
- Use `parameters.layout` to control story layout
- Define `argTypes` for complex controls (selects, radios, actions)
- Set `args` for defaults shared across stories

### Story Objects
- Each story is a named export of type `StoryObj<typeof meta>`
- Use `args` to override defaults for specific stories
- Use `decorators` for story-specific wrappers
- Use `parameters` for story-specific settings
- Use `play` for interaction testing

### Naming
- PascalCase for story names
- Descriptive names that explain what the story shows
- Group related stories with comment sections

### Managed Marker
- First line must be `// @storyteller-managed`
- Everything above `CUSTOM STORIES` line is managed by storyteller
- Everything below is preserved during sync
